attributes.action: Enable and welcome Donald Trump on a state visit
attributes.additional_details: Media driven hostility to an invitation from the uk Prime Minister in denegrating an official invite for a state visit.
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition to welcome the President of the United States on a state visit to see HRH queen Elizabeth. We appreciate the President is acting in good faith in protecting his countries borders and will not be swayed by media pressure in welcoming a state visit.
